title: Bill Maker Pro
description: A simple bill maker application that allows users to create and customize their own bills. Users can input their name, the amount, and the due date, and the application will generate a professional-looking bill that can be printed or saved as a PDF.
tech: Canvas API (for rendering the bill layout and design)
LocalStorage (for saving bill templates and user data)
jsPDF (for generating PDF versions of the bills)
